features.situation: to rolls to notice you've been cheated by dishonest merchants

a11c7f08-6cd7-4106-bd53-66fa06d9168b.name: Loner
a11c7f08-6cd7-4106-bd53-66fa06d9168b.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever anyone lingers nearby, watches over your shoulder, etc. If you fail, you lash out at that person just as if you had Bad Temper.

529b3db5-d243-4228-beda-f18630608146.name: Odious Personal Habit

4a906470-c51f-426d-908a-13f1ca248cac.notes: You are a member of a minority that the dominant culture around you regards as “barbarians” or “inferior.”

from others of your own kind in an area, profession, or situation where your minority is especially rare

9a7b1b23-faa6-461b-be76-aaa815e835fe.name: Social Stigma (Second-Class Citizen)
